testcase.name: TC06 Contact Us Form
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to url 'http://automationexercise.com'.......................passed When Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed When Click on 'Contact Us' button sign......................................passed When Verify 'GET IN TOUCH' is visible text..................................passed When Enter name, email, subject and message.................................passed When Upload file............................................................passed When Click 'Submit' button sign.............................................passed When Click OK button........................................................passed When Verify success message 'Success! Your details have been submitted successfully.' is visible.passed Then Click 'Home' button and verify that landed to home page successfully...passed
